doc.title: Mr. Jack Entertains in His Office
doc.plot: Mr. Jack is a gay old sport who is continually getting into mischief when he thinks Mrs. Jack is not likely to be around. On this occasion he is entertaining three frisky chorus girls in his office when Mrs. Jack unexpectedly appears on the scene. Mr. Jack hides the girls in various places; putting one in the safe, another under his desk, and the third in the guise of his stenographer. Mrs. Jack does not suspect anything out of the ordinary, and after receiving some money wherewith to do her shopping, leaves the office and Mr. Jack with the three young ladies proceeds to have a jollification.
